div.p:
Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Alexandri
Rede Anno Domini et cetera nonogesimo secundo

Jacobus gordone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa / Jure paternitatis

Patricius gordone de methlik iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s'

Robertus gordone de vthaw iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Andreas Wilsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
de mandato consilium ad instanciam domini Johannis Strathachin'
pro suo seruicio in choro Abirdonensis prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus myrtone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde gracia
burgi prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Johannes annand' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit
filiam burgensis prestito Solito Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Johannes mark recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde in propinacione Roberto
huchonsone cantori facta et consessa prestito Solito Juramento

Andreas lousone in Dyvernesyd' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
Solut' duabus marcis et prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus Stile ad instanciam magistri Andree byssat recipitur in
liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes logy iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento

Alexander Crag Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes Duncanson iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito
Juramento

Johannes Crukschank filius Dauid Crukschank alias talyour' racione
paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s'
s' in alba bursa

Symon Richerdsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde

Johannes murray ad instanciam vxoris thome prat recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Jacobus godard' recipitur in liberum burgensem ad instanciam Andree cas' coci prestito
Solito Juramento

Willelmus massy recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento

Alexander horne iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Solut'
quinque s' et prestito Solito Juramento

Duncanus portar Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam Johannis colisone
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Andreas tuliboy recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit filiam burgensis prestito
Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Johannes Robertsone in taruas recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento
Thomas philp recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Donaldus Stane pistor recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam burgensis
prestito Solito Juramento

Richardus Wricht racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento

The saide dayThis is probably a continuation of the court on page 386. mastir Alexander fyf forspekar for Jonhne
of lammyngtone protestit Solemptlie that he suld' fall
in nay pley anent his fee and heretage

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Richerd
hil yongar forspekar that adam brone sal content and pay to Jonhne lammynton'
xv s' Scottis money and xxxtj futuale eftir the tenor' of his
obligacion within terme of law

the saide day Williame younge oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to warand keip and defend' Jonhne mvnk and Jonhne myll
skathles for the wrak of ane ald' hous' bocht fra his modir

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert
blinsele forspekar that the aldirman and balyeis sal pas' and cers' gif
thai may comprehend' the gudis that thomes chamer talyour' resauit
fra the Inglismen' and deliuer thame agane to the Inglismen or ellis
the Siluer that he tuk for the saide gudis And' falyeing tharof to mak
the Inglismen be pait of ij barrelis of Salmond' of the rediast
of the said thomas gudis

The said' day the borghe' Strekit be Jonhne of Culane one philp
Dunbrek for the wranguis' halding fra him and deliuering to thome
menyes of ane barrel of Salmond' was fundin of nane avale
and the said' Jonhne in Amerciament of the court and the said' philp quyt of the
challangis of the saidez Jonhne and thomas of the said' j barrel of Salmond'

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
Robert blinsele forspekar that becaus' henry bawne entromet
titwith thar bolbrige and castin it done that he sal bige and
vpmak the said brig agan als' gude as it was quhen
he entromettit tharwith and find Souerte tharfor and his persone and
his gudis to be arrestit and remane within the tolbue vnto
the tyme the said brige be bigit als' gude as it was
obefor

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis'
Robert blinsel forspekar that thome menyeis sal content and pay
to Jonhne of Culane ane barrell of Salmond'

The saide day Jonhne lammyngtone was quyt of ane
obligacion of vij s' and vij g' and of the maile of ane Rude
of land' follouit be Adam brone Richerd hill yongar forspekar
of the assis'

Eodem die sponsa Willelmi Kintor legittime vocata respondere plegio
super ipsam porrecto per Ricardum hill Juniorem pro iniusta detencione
vnius yone argentati ab eo non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo
Dunbrek seriando districtum ab eadem recipere et eundem ad plegium
dimitti si petatur ipsam ad proximam Curiam legalem premunire

Eodem die Dauid prat inuenit Ricardum hill Juniorem plegium legalem
quod Johannes Steuarte et famuli suj erunt Indempnes pro eo et seruis
suis aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus Johannes inuenit Johannem culan plegium
legalem quod dictus Dauid et serui suj erunt Indempnes per pro eo aliter quam per
viam iuris et vterque pars obligatur ad conseruandum plegios suos Indempnes

Eodem die Johannes Steuarte produxit in Judicio et
presente perlegi fecit quandam cartam sibi factam per quondam Richardum
balrouny de et super quadam terra Jacente in vico furcarum
ex orientali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam Richardi lundoris
versus austrum et terram Dauid adamsone versus boriam In
quaquidam carta Reseruata fuerunt liberi introitus et exitus
temporibus necessariis et oportunis eidem Ricardo heredibus suis
assignatis et seruis ad orrium et ortum Jacentes ex cauda orientali
dicte terre inter Dauid prat hereditarie contingen'

Eodem die margareta fechat relicta quondam Dauid hile fecit creauit
constituit et nominavit Willelmum blinsel suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum
namos et districtus captos de quadam terra sibi racione coniuncte
infeodacionis remansur' per Johannem lammyngtone restituendos
et in omnibus aliis actionibus causis et controuersiis ipsam concer
nentibus promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

Eodem die Willelmus nicholson in Amerciamento Curie pro iniusta recepcione
fimj de terra et hospicio Dauid adamsone per os thome prat et cetera
cuj emendabit iut iura volunt Et Idem Dauid Amerciatur pro
perturbio dicti Willelmi Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die In presencia Dauid prat ballivi blinsel et Jacobi colison'
thomas chamer Scissor per manus ostensionem se fide media obligauit ad
persoluendum Alexandro rede preposito vnam barrellam salmonum sufficientis mercimonijj
in festo Sancti Johannis baptiste proximo futuro aut infra xv dies inde sequens et dictus
Alexander sibi soluet xviij s' tempore recepcionis dicte barrelle Salmonum

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis accusit margaret balcromy
for the wranguis' housin of wictale in contrar the common' ordinance
and profit of the tone Item for tappin of meile to hir singular
profit and in gret skath to the tone and to the communite Alsua for the
byinge of wictalis in vntyme oulkis dais and mercat dais
Alsua for the ourbyinge of our' nichtbouris to the gret skatht
of the tone Alsua for the common brekin of the Statutis
and commone ordinance of the tone' Alsua for the conspiracion in the
Inbrynging off gentill men be senister informacion opon' the officiaris
of the tovn' and for the lychlyng off the offyciaris Item for ane
vnlauchfull persone to duell within this tone quhilkis
the said margaret denyit And' in continent the saide actionis
was putt to the decisione of thir personis vndir writin that
is to say Robert blinsele thomas prat James colisone
Androw culane yongar Jonhne Wormet Jonhne Steuinson' thomas
mar' William blinsele Walter auchneywe Androw murray
William portar patrik andirsone William futhes Jonhne
blak Androu Wentone Jonhne grige Jonhne Durvarde
Jonhne portar and Dauid Duffous' quhilkis riplie avisit
the gret aithis suorne deliuerit and fand' be the moutht
of thomas mar' forspekar of the saide assis' that thai coud'
nocht acquyt the said' margaret of al the pyntis beforsaid'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die
Januarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die comparuit nobilis vir Alexander Setone de meldrum cum
Willelmo blinsel suo prelocutore et exposuit quod ad suam deuenit noticiam
quod quondam Johannes Knollis ex senistra informacione quarundam
personarum male disposicionarum in preiudicium prolium sue filie et Alexandri
Knollis heredum dicti Johannis contra et expresse Jus commune
certas pretensas sasinas si sasine dicti debeant si pro non
de quibusdam terras Johanni Knollis filio quondam dicti Johannis
ex et pro eo quod Idem olim Johannes non potuit premunire heredi
in lecto egritudinis et mortis et pro aliis causis et racionibus
temporibus et locis oportunis ostend' protestan' et cetera pro Juris
Remedio Testibus Alexandro rede preposito Alexandro chamer thoma fyf
Johanne menyes et Dauid prat ballivis Roberto blinsel
thoma prat Johanne Wormet et Jacobo colisone et Inde
peciit Instrumentum

Eodem die Alexander Setone de meldrum fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit Robertum blinsel Willelmum blinsel et magistrum
Alexandrum fyf coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores petend'
exigend' et recipiend' omnia bona Jure hereditario Elene Knollis et margarete
Knollis filiabus quondam Alexandri Knollis et heredibus quondam Johannis Knollis
contingen' Ac in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum et dictas proles concernentibus
ad agendum prosequendum defendendum promitten' de Rato et grato Judicio
Cisti et Judicat' soluere in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus clausulis
necessariis et Oportunis et cetera

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisicionem Johannis brovne
div.p:
Thomas prat Jacobus Colison Andreas murray senior thomas mar'
Andreas branche murdaicus glenmaluyn Dauid mar Walterus
auchneyve Johannes Steuinsone Willelmus portar Willelmus goldsmytht
Andreas philpsone Richardus lytstar Willelmus philp Jacobus
crage Alexander logy et Johannes hill Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes
brovne frater Johannis brovne latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et
sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de vna terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex
Orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Willelmi tulidef ex
australi ex vna et terram forfy auchinhuff ex boreali partibus ex
altera Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Johannis fratris
suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et valet per annum xiij s'
et iiij d' Et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur per seruicium burgagium
de Suppremo domino nostro Rege Et nunc existit in manibus
Suppremi domini nostri Regis per duos menses aut eocirca in defectu
veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis datum et clausum et cetera

The said day the aldirman and ballieis with avys' of the consall
assignit this day xv dais to thomas fyf to preyf the ake
maid betuix him and James Kintor' to philp of Dunbrek apone
menyeis Anent the pament of j barrel of salmond sufficientlie defisit
and him and the said James releuit of the said' j barrel Salmond'

The said day thomas fyf fand' ane borghe' in the handis of
thomas James officiar of the court that he aucht to haue xl dais to his
preyf anent the defysinge of him and James Kintor' of the said' ak consider
and' his preuis as he allegit was beyond' fortht and askit warde
and dome of the said' borghe

The said day Jonhne moir' was fundin quyt of the Intro
meting of Jonhne of Knollis gudis as yet be ane Suorne
assis' thomas prat forspekar

The said day Ellene the wif of Jonhne blak producit ane
testimonial' vndir the Sele of Androw Culane eldar balye
for the tyme makinge mencion' that scho was in sesin
of ane Inland' liand' in the g castalgate that scho now
Inhabitis and in half the yard of the samyn annuel fre for al
the dais of hir lywe and askit at the balyeis to ger'
call William buchane hir sone to Comper and schew his
richtis and defisance in contrar' hir' said Sesin and letter becaus'
the said day was assignit to him obefor and the copy of the
said' testimonial' distrenit to him one his expens' And the
said William nor nane vthiris comperit not obiekit agan
the said letter Sesin tharfor the ballieis ordanit the said Ellene
to be obeit in the peciable' Josin and breukin of hir' said'
coniunctfeftment eftir the tenor of hir' testimonial' of sesin
forsaid' for ony richt schevin to thame in the contrar'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die
Januarij anno quo supra

The samyn day the aldirman offerit him redy to the spous
of Jonhne Waus to content and pay hir' in hir husbandis
nayme the vale of hal the neithe that Richerd ruthir
furd' Intromettit with safar as cane be sufficientlie
preuit be thame that knew hir' best And' siclik he offe
rit him redy to content the saide Jonhne obefor'

The aldirman the said day schew to the balyeis and clerk
that becaus' al breuis of Sesin direct fra the kingis
chapele was direkit to the aldirman and balyeis herfor
J he requirit thame that nay Sesin be gevin be thame
vnto the tyme the said' lettres of Sesin be present to the
aldirman and balyeis for the Eschevin of preiudice to richtwis'
ayris

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit to John
Westland' with his avne Consent to preif that he has
pait to Jonhne of Kintor the maile of the tavarne that he
now inhabitis of al termes bigane within xxiiij houris eftir
the saide Jonhnis cumin to Abirdene he being warnit tharto
